attributes.action: Suspend further consideration of the Home Secretary's Policing and Crime Bill until the validity of her expense claims has been fully investigated
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Current policy is that Ministers' and MPs' expense claims must be seen to be beyond question. Questions have nevertheless arisen regarding Jacqui Smith's second home expense claims. This is unacceptable at a time of public outcry against unwarranted extravagance in all sectors of society. We therefore call upon the Prime Minister to suspend further consideration of the Home Secretary's Policing and Crime Bill until the validity of her expense claims has been independently determined.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
